name: Adventurer's Breakfast Sandwich
desc: A nutritious egg dish. Luxurious mayonnaise sits atop a lining of ham and poached egg toast. The smooth mouthfeel fills you with energy for the long road ahead, and is one of the Adventurers' Guild's top-rated breakfasts.

value.text: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

customize.name: Recipe: Adventurer's Breakfast Sandwich
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making an Adventurer's Breakfast Sandwich.

customize.name: Bird Egg
customize.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Ham
customize.desc: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

customize.name: Delicious Adventurer's Breakfast Sandwich
customize.desc: A nutritious egg dish. The mayonnaise rises like the sun over the rippling poached egg's surface, and the exquisite mouthfeel really hits the spot. The unique salty flavor of the ham cuts right through the mix as well, like light parting the gathered clouds.

customize.name: Suspicious Adventurer's Breakfast Sandwich
customize.desc: A nutritious egg dish. The congealed mayonnaise is almost solid, and it is lined with tough ham and over-boiled egg. At least wolfing it down will make you full all the same.

customize.name: Mika
customize.desc: A young knight born to an ordinary family. He serves as a Front-Line Surveyor in his Company. He is a low-key and cautious character.

customize.name: Surveyor's Breakfast Sandwich
customize.desc: Mika's specialty. The luxurious spread before you is a veritable hillock of ingredients, and as you take a small bite, each clearly-demarcated layer of flavor and savory spice spreads throughout your mouth, as if you have climbed some mountain of gourmet. Are these the culinary skills he has honed while with the Knights?
